review.title: “Working Environment at Kirloskar Technologies”
review.pros: Pros – The company works like a team with strong objectives and principles. The company has very seasoned members form whom there is a lot to learn and who also are the best mentors. The company is very valued by its customers and holds strong competition.
review.cons: Cons – Required changes in the company happen a little slow. Being distributors of medical equipments, we rely on our principle companies a lot.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Increasing your resources for better performance.
